author: xtqqczze
body:

comments.body:
> I can fix more issues in this PR, if you agree in principle with the changes?

I like the style, it is short and clean. At least in the PR :-)

It is better to create new PRs and fix all code base with forcing (if this will be possible) the rule at end to exclude regressions.
